item.title: iTerm2 + zsh
item.description: iTerm2 + zsh Install powerline/fonts powerline/fonts: Patched fonts for Powerline users. Here we install it to support agnoster.zsh-theme. powerline/fonts git repo Install by git-clone and run install.sh 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # clone git clone https://github.com/powerline/fonts.git --depth=1 # install cd fonts ./install.sh # clean-up a bit (optional) cd .. rm -rf fonts iTerm2 preference configuration To test if your terminal and font support agnoster.
